markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Prisoner](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=437)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You might have been imprisoned for crimes (whether you were guilty or not), or enslaved for some part of your upbringing. In your adventuring life, you take full advantage of your newfound freedom.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Constitution, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) skill, and the [Underworld Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Experienced Smuggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=779) skill feat.
name: Prisoner

text: Prisoner Source Player Core pg. 88 2.0 You might have been imprisoned for crimes (whether you were guilty or not), or enslaved for some part of your upbringing. In your adventuring life, you take full advantage of your newfound freedom. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength or Constitution, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Stealth skill, and the Underworld Lore skill. You gain the Experienced Smuggler skill feat.
